title: Pandora Gets Vain
description: After capturing jealousy from a priestess in Crete, Pandy, Alcie, Iole and Dido are off to Egypt in search of the second of seven evils, vanity. But the goddess Hera is still up to her old tricks, and throws as many obstacles as she can into Pandy's path. A storm at sea, a group of talking dolphins and the most unusual circus ever formed all feature in this action-packed follow-up.
author: Carolyn Hennesy
